faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Green & Portable Software
faq.description: Have questions about green or portable software? Find answers below or contact us.

items.title: What is Green Software?
items.description: Green software refers to portable applications that don't require traditional installation. They can run directly after extraction, don't modify system registry, and don't leave residual files after deletion, making them clean and efficient to use.

items.title: What's the difference between Green and Portable Software?
items.description: Green software and portable software are essentially the same thing. Both terms refer to applications that can run without installation. The term 'green' emphasizes its environmental friendliness (leaving no system traces), while 'portable' emphasizes its mobility between computers.

items.title: Do I need to install Green Software?
items.description: No, that's the beauty of green software! Simply download, extract the files, and run the executable (.exe) file directly. No installation process is needed, making it perfect for portable use on any computer.

items.title: Is Green Software safe to use?
items.description: Yes, our green software is safe to use. We carefully verify all software before publishing, scan for viruses, and only provide software from reliable sources. Additionally, green software's portable nature means it won't affect your system files.

items.title: How do I use Green Software?
items.description: Using green software is simple: 1) Download the zip file 2) Extract it to your preferred location 3) Run the main program file (.exe) directly. You can even carry it on a USB drive and use it on different computers.

items.title: Can I run portable software from a USB drive?
items.description: Yes! That's one of the main advantages of portable software. You can store it on a USB drive and run it on any compatible computer without installation. This makes it perfect for carrying your favorite tools wherever you go.

items.title: What are the advantages of Portable Software?
items.description: Portable software offers numerous benefits: runs without installation, works from any storage device (USB, external drive), doesn't modify system files, easy to backup, perfect for work environments with software installation restrictions, and ideal for testing software without commitment.

items.title: Will portable software save my settings?
items.description: Yes, portable software typically saves its settings in its own folder rather than in system locations. This means your preferences and settings travel with the software, making it truly portable between different computers.

items.title: Can I remove Green Software completely?
items.description: Yes! Since green software doesn't install anything into your system, removal is as simple as deleting the folder containing the program. No uninstallation process is needed, and no residual files will be left behind.

items.title: Do portable applications work on all Windows versions?
items.description: Most portable applications work across different Windows versions, but it's always good to check the compatibility requirements. We clearly list the supported Windows versions for each software in its description.
